mapper.sql: id, project_id AS projectId, project_name AS projectName, builder, owner, identifier, crane_no AS craneNo, device_no AS deviceNo, lift_frequency AS liftFrequency, percentage0, percentage40, percentage60, percentage80, percentage90, percentage110, percentage120, weight_warn AS weightWarn, range_warn AS rangeWarn, limit_warn AS limitWarn, moment_warn AS momentWarn, collision_warn AS collisionWarn, weight_alarm AS weightAlarm, range_alarm AS rangeAlarm, limit_alarm AS limitAlarm, moment_alarm AS momentAlarm, collision_alarm AS collisionAlarm, wind_speed_alarm AS windSpeedAlarm, tilt_alarm AS tiltAlarm, work_date AS workDate
